Introduction

Shim Hye-won/Annabelle Shim, known under her stage name Belle, is a South Korean-American singer-songwriter, dancer, producer, and composer under S2 Entertainment and AURA. She is best known as the main vocalist of the girl group KISS OF LIFE.

On May 16, 2023, Belle was revealed the second member of KISS OF LIFE. The group officially debuted on July 5th, 2023, with their self-titled mini album "KISS OF LIFE".
